papers.title: Policy-Based Access Control for Multi-Agent Service Coordination
papers.summary_excerpt: Introduces policy-based authorization framework for coordinating access to shared services among multiple autonomous agents. Supports dynamic policy adjustment.

papers.title: Multi-Agent Privilege Delegation and Scope Enforcement
papers.summary_excerpt: Presents delegation framework for multi-agent systems with strict scope boundary enforcement. Implements zero-trust principles for agent API access.
